activity.name: Which of the following workplace conditions should raise concerns about the effectiveness of the University’s internal controls?

activity.name: Which of the following workplace conditions should raise concerns about the effectiveness of the University’s internal controls?
activity.description: Which of the following workplace conditions should raise concerns about the effectiveness of the University’s internal controls?

component.description: The employee who receives goods also distributes them to various departments.
Physical inventories are rarely carried out by independent personnel.
Purchases have been made that are inconsistent with past trends.
A large number of payroll checks are manually prepared.
The organization has no policy regarding disposal of obsolete or surplus materials.
